body_html: @xysmlx yet using command like "nvprof python xxx.py" can profile program, But it's too slow to profile especially when I want to output profile data like "nvprof --log-file out.csv --csv ......" or "nvprof --export-profile out.prof ......". Have you ever had such a problem?

body: @xysmlx yet using command like "nvprof python xxx.py" can profile program, But it's too slow to profile especially when I want to output profile data like "nvprof --log-file out.csv --csv ......" or "nvprof --export-profile out.prof ......". Have you ever had such a problem?
